name: BHS Testing
info:
Located across the hall from Urgent Care. Check-in with staff in atrium. Anyone under age 18 should be accompanied by a parent or guardian. 

Walk-in vaccinations also available from 4pm-7:30pm at Urgent Care.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Rutland Public Library
info:
***Second Dose Clinic***
This will be a Pfizer 2nd dose clinic for anyone 16 years and older.
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Citizen Center
vaccines: Moderna COVID-19 Vaccine, Janssen COVID-19 Vaccine
info: MODERNA and Jannssen VACCINE FOR THOSE 18 AND OLDER WHO LIVE WORK OR ATTEND SCHOOL IN HAVERHILL
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.

name: Saint Vincent Hospital Vaccine Collaborative @ Worcester State University - Wellness Center
info:
***By appointment only***
Minors under the age of 18 MUST have a signed parental/legal guardian consent when arriving to the clinic
special: If you are signing up for a second dose, you must get the same vaccine brand as your first dose.
